item.description:
In this fun and practical workshop, you will design your desired ideal life, and then create a visual expression of it to keep you on track in achieving it. Using guided visualization, journaling, the law of attraction, and other time-tested techniques, you will take a 360-degree view of your life and identify key elements you want to include in your ideal future. Then, you will create a two-dimensional representation of your life vision on paper. We provide you with all the tools, including lots of images – no artistic skills required! Bring a journal and some favorite photos & magazines.
Both Mia and Barb earned Bachelors degrees from Clark University, where they first became friends; since then, they have designed and led workshops on a variety of topics in the U.S. and abroad.

$35 with advanced registration(3 days ahead), $40 at the door

 

 

Directions to A Higher Balance

A Higher Balance Healing Center is located at 201-203 Washington Street, Suite #6B in downtown Salem, MA.  The center is directly above Starbucks, but enter the main building at the doorway to the left of H&R Block.  Above the door is labeled The Hawthorne Building, 201-203.  Take the elevator to the second floor, and go right to Suite #6B at the end of the hall. There is parking in front of the building.  You will need four quarters for a 2-hr. meter.  For workshops or training programs that run longer than two hours, there is free parking a bit further down Lafayette Street where there is a park in the shape of a triangle.  Free parking with no meters is available on all sides of the triangle.  It is located across the street from The Art Corner.

group.name: Women Supporting Women Through Life's Incredible Journeys

item.name: Vision Boarding with Mia and Barb
